content: embrace the cozy comfort of the trenta hood crochet pattern designed for easy crafting and stylish wear this versatile pixie pattern fits most teens and adults offering a unisex oversized fit for a trendy look worked flat in wool of the andes superwash bulky yarn this seamed design features stripes/colorwork for added flair with clear written instructions and a simple construction this pattern is perfect for crocheters of all skill levels **unique features-** unisex oversized fit for trendy style easy level pattern suitable for all skill levels worked flat with clear written instructions stylish stripes/colorwork design for added flair **materials needed-** hook 6 5mm us size 10 5 yarn wool of the andes superwash bulky https //tidd ly/4mcgqes bulky weight 335 yards **matching patterns available ** trenta wristers https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/trenta-wristers https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/trenta-wristers trenta scarf https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/trenta-scarf https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/trenta-scarf
